sense.def:
One's opinion of something
je tisto, kar človek misli o nečem.

seg.quote: The students were eager to express their opinions.
Information of this nature was valuable, in his opinion.
We have a high opinion of you.

sense.def:
To be of the opinion that something is the case
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj res;

seg.quote: He is of the opinion that money is not important.

sense.def:
Z besedo
opinion
lahko označujemo mnenja in prepričanja ljudi.

seg.quote: Difficulties arise where there's a difference of opinion.
